pageContext.claim: “And you know, this [debate] commission, they've already apologized to me for what they did. They were oscillating my mic during one debate. They've actually apologized. If you can believe it, I have it in writing that they were doing it.”
pageContext.analysis: The debate commission did not apologize to Trump. At a 2016 debate, a malfunction caused Trump's microphone to cut out momentarily in the feed inside the debate hall, but his volume on television was not affected.
